Package org.zurdavid.petrinets

Interface IPetrinetAppView

All Known Implementing Classes:
PetrinetFrame
public interface IPetrinetAppView
The interface serves as the main interface of the application's view. It provides methods to load new Petri net graphs and reachability graphs, as well as methods that provide access to the other three interfaces of the view:
  • IPetrinetView
  • IReachabilityGraph
  • ITextView

  • Method Summary

    The method loads the given Petri net into the Petri net view and displays it.

  • Method Details

    • loadPetrinet

      void loadPetrinet(IPetrinet petrinet)
      The method loads the given Petri net into the Petri net view and displays it.
      Parameters:
      petrinet - The Petri net to be displayed.

    • loadReachabilityGraph

      void loadReachabilityGraph(IReachabilityGraph graph)
      The method loads the given reachability graph into reachability graph view and displays it.
      Parameters:
      graph - The reachability graph to be displayed.
